Agriculture.name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
Agriculture.description: Income support of ₹6,000 per year for all landholding farmer families.
Agriculture.criteria: Must be a landholding farmer family. Institutional landholders are not eligible. Family income must be verified.

Agriculture.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
Agriculture.description: Provides soil health cards to farmers to improve yield and reduce fertilizer cost.
Agriculture.criteria: Available to all farmers. Must provide a soil sample from the cultivable land.

Education.name: Post-Matric Scholarship
Education.description: Financial assistance for SC/ST students studying at post-matriculation or post-secondary stage.
Education.criteria: Must belong to SC/ST category. Annual family income must be less than ₹2.5 Lakhs. Must be enrolled in a government-recognized institution.

Education.name: National Overseas Scholarship
Education.description: Financial support for low-income students to pursue Masters/PhD abroad.
Education.criteria: Masters/PhD level only. Minimum 60% marks in previous degree. Age must be below 35 years.

MSME.name: PMEGP (Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme)
MSME.description: Credit-linked subsidy program for generation of employment opportunities through establishment of micro enterprises.
MSME.criteria: Any individual above 18 years of age. Project cost up to ₹25 Lakhs (Manufacturing) or ₹10 Lakhs (Service). Minimum 8th pass for projects above ₹10 Lakhs.

MSME.name: Mudra Loan (Shishu)
MSME.description: Loans up to ₹50,000 for new businesses.
